statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 1 , 2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - x - 1 , -2 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 3 , -4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x + 4 , 16 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} + 22 \, x - 7\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
